sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button>
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>

<style scoped>
button {
  display: inline-block;
  outline: 0;
  border: 0;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: rgb(72, 76, 122);
  font-size: 14px;
  height: 38px;
  padding: 8px 24px;
  border-radius: 25px;
  background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #fff, #f5f5fa);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 11px 0 rgb(37 44 97 / 15%),
    0 1px 3px 0 rgb(93 100 148 / 20%);
  transition: all 0.2s ease-out;
 
  }
</style>
